channel.title: Swedish Tech Events (Malmö)
channel.description: Events for developers, technologists, and other geeks in Sweden

item.title: 2021-12-01 17:30 Intro to Neo4j: The Data Science Graph Database - Neo4j-Öresund
item.description: Hosted by our friends at Data Science Malmö and taking place at Foo Café, we're pleased to introduce you to using Neo4j for graph data science. Join Data Science Malmö over at https://www.meetup.com/...

item.title: 2021-11-08 17:30 Implementing GitOps best practices with Crossplane and ArgoCD - DevOps Malmö
item.description: Register here: https://foocafe.org/event/implementing-gitops-best-practices-crossplane-and-argocd Abstract: GitOps is a rising modern software delivery...

item.title: 2021-11-11 17:30 How to implement Zero Trust - Azure Skåne
item.description: Azure Skåne User Group is happy to invite you to another great session. This time we focus on Zero Trust. Schedule: 17.30 - 17.45: Welcome and Mingle 17.45 - 17.50: Intro 17.50 - 18.30: How to implement Zero Trust 18.30 - 19.00: Food brea...

item.title: 2021-11-09 18:00 Data Revelry @ Jayway - Data Science Malmö
item.description: As we're now allowed to meet in person, the data people at Jayway want to throw a party to celebrate. And to that end, Jayway is hosting a meetup at their Malmo offices Nov. 9th. They will provide the beer and pizza from 18:00. At 19:00 we'll listen with a few talks from data ...

item.title: 2021-12-02 17:30 Microsoft Ignite Azure Skåne
item.description: Azure Skåne User Group is happy to invite you to this Microsoft Ignite Watch Party hosted by Johan Åhlén (Azure MVP) and Michael Jonsson (Azure MVP): Innovate with Cloud Native and Open Source on Azure 17.30 - 17.45: Welcome and Intro 17.45 - 18.15: Video ...

item.title: 2021-11-30 17:30 Tales of ethical hacking: war stories from ten years of penetration testing - Joint Academy Tech
item.description: Joint Academy is hosting a meetup at the Malmö office Nov 30th. Linus Kvarnhammar from the SVT show ”Hackad” will give some behind-the-scenes anecdotes from the TV-show. Linus will also talk about cases he has worked with during his 10 years of ethical hacking. On top of that ...
